alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:14AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Oakland, Macomb and northeastern St. Clair Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 313 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rochester to Clinton. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Armada around 325 AM EDT. New Baltimore, Richmond and Harsens Island around 330 AM EDT. Algonac and Marine City around 335 AM EDT. St. Clair around 340 AM EDT. Marysville around 345 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Anchorville, Adair, Shelby Township, Rattle Run, Goodells, Ray Center, Utica, Fraser, Smiths Creek and Washington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
